title: Perl 5.24.1 fails to build (RHEL 7)
body:
Presumably related to #5718 . On a RHEL7 box, the default perl version has a build failure. This blocks installation of gcc and is therefore significant. I can reproduce the error in a clean spack install with no cached packages or custom configuration. From the same state, qmcpack and all dependencies can be fully installed, so spack is "working" on this machine.

Let me know what else might help diagnose the issue.
